kRutvO#&BiqShutya#M brahmavAqdinO# vadanti paqvitra#vantOq&nyE grahA# gRuqhyantEq kiMpa#vitra upAq(gm)qSuritiq vAkpa#vitraq iti# brUyAd-vAqcaspata#yE pavasva vAjiqnnityA#ha vAqcaivaina#M pavayatiq vRuShNO# aq(gm)qSuByAqmityA#haq vRuShNOq hyE#tAvaq(gm)qSU yau sOma#syaq gaBa#stipUtaq ityA#haq gaBa#stinAq hyE#naM paqvaya#ti 
dEqvO dEqvAnA$M paqvitra#maqsItyA#ha dEqvO hyE#Sha- [  ] 22
